ansia.title: Deep Calm - 528Hz
ansia.description: Specific frequencies to reduce anxiety and stress. Therapy for anxious animals

iperattivazione.title: Guided Relaxation - 10-13Hz
iperattivazione.description: Sequences to calm hyperactivation and agitation in animals

umoreBasso.title: Positive Energy - 40Hz
umoreBasso.description: Gentle stimulation to improve depressed mood and lethargy

controlloComportamentale.title: Calm and Control - 432Hz
controlloComportamentale.description: Frequencies to reduce aggression and reactive behaviors

stressAcuto.title: Anti-Stress - 528Hz
stressAcuto.description: Therapy for chronic stress and accumulated tension

supportoEmotivo.title: Inner Security - 111Hz
supportoEmotivo.description: Protective frequencies for fearful and insecure animals

descriptions.anxiety: Specific protocol to reduce separation anxiety and improve pet confidence.
descriptions.aggression: Control techniques to manage aggressive and reactive behaviors.
descriptions.fear: Desensitization exercises to overcome specific fears.
descriptions.hyperactivity: Activities to channel excessive energy into positive behaviors.
descriptions.emotional: Personalized emotional support to improve pet mood and wellbeing.
descriptions.general: General protocol to improve overall behavior and wellbeing.

personalizedRecommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations

ageAdvice.puppy: Extra patience - puppies need longer adaptation times
ageAdvice.young: Youthful energy - increase physical activity to reduce stress
ageAdvice.adult: Adult phase - maintain consistent routines for stability
ageAdvice.senior: Senior age - reduce sudden changes and increase comfort

breedAdvice.border: Intelligent breed - daily mental stimuli are essential
breedAdvice.golden: Gentle temperament - positive reinforcements very effective
breedAdvice.shepherd: Protective breed - work on gradual socialization

weightAdvice.small: Small size - short sessions (5-10 min) but frequent
weightAdvice.large: Large size - longer sessions (20-30 min) with breaks

personalizedRecommendations.healthAdvice: Monitor stress signs carefully during training. Consult veterinarian before starting intensive protocols.

emotionTips.anxiety: Create a safe and predictable environment. Avoid sudden routine changes.
emotionTips.aggression: Stay calm and maintain safe distance. Use positive reinforcement, never punishments.
emotionTips.fear: Gradual desensitization. Don't force exposure, proceed with patience.
emotionTips.sadness: Increase rewarding activities and positive social interactions.
emotionTips.general: Maintain training consistency and celebrate every small progress.

frequencyAdvice.careful: 1 session per day to avoid overstimulation

predictions.wellnessImproving: Your pet's wellness is improving. Continue with current care.
predictions.wellnessDeclining: Wellness shows signs of decline. Consider a veterinary visit.

predictions.continueAnalyzing: Continue analyzing to collect seasonal data
predictions.anxietyEpisodes: anxiety episodes in the last 7 days. I recommend a behavioral veterinary consultation.
predictions.anxietyDetected: anxiety episodes detected. Consider relaxation techniques.
predictions.sadnessPattern: sadness episodes in the last 7 days. Increase stimulating activities.
predictions.aggressiveAlert: aggressive episodes detected. Immediate behavioral intervention recommended.
predictions.happyTrend: happy episodes in the last 7 days! Maintain current strategies.
predictions.analysisLast7Days: analyses in the last 7 days. Increase monitoring for more accurate data.
predictions.positiveEmotionsIncrease: % positive emotions compared to previous week.
predictions.recentAnalysesStable: recent analyses show stable behavior. Continue regular monitoring.
predictions.weatherPredictionDesc: Behavioral predictions based on real weather
predictions.enableGeolocation: Enable geolocation in browser to use Weather Mood Predictor

predictions.mockReasoningError: Simulated data - unable to get accurate predictions
predictions.defaultMusicDescription: Default music - weather data not available
predictions.highTempReasoning: High temperatures push animals to seek cooling
predictions.coolZoneRecommendation: Make sure they have access to cool areas and fresh water
predictions.coldTempReasoning: Low temperatures push animals to seek heat sources
predictions.warmPlaceRecommendation: Prepare a warm and cozy place
predictions.sunnyDayReasoning: Sunny days increase energy and desire to play
predictions.outdoorActivityRecommendation: Schedule extra physical activity and outdoor games
predictions.rainyDayReasoning: Rain tends to make animals calmer and lazier
predictions.indoorActivityRecommendation: Indoor activities and cuddles are ideal
predictions.stormReasoning: Storms and thunder can cause stress and fear
predictions.safeEnvironmentRecommendation: Create a safe and reassuring environment
predictions.energeticMusicDescription: Energetic music for bright and warm days

ansioso.1: Pet shows signs of generalized anxiety with tremors and restlessness
ansioso.2: Avoidance behavior and constant search for safe refuges
ansioso.3: Accelerated breathing and hypervigilance towards external stimuli
ansioso.4: Difficulty relaxing, with tendency to pace and excessive vocalizations

triste.1: Reduced general activity and decreased interest in play
triste.2: Lowered body posture with ears back and tail down
triste.3: Less social interaction and tendency towards isolation
triste.4: Reduced appetite and irregular sleep with signs of melancholy

aggressivo.1: High muscle tension with rigid and threatening posture
aggressivo.2: Aggressive vocalizations accompanied by growling and intense barking
aggressivo.3: Exacerbated territoriality and reactivity to specific stimuli
aggressivo.4: Challenging behavior with prolonged staring and rigid movement

felice.1: High positive reactivity with fluid and playful movements
felice.2: Increased social interaction and active contact seeking
felice.3: Relaxed body posture with raised tail and erect ears
felice.4: Balanced energy with spontaneous interest in the surrounding environment

eccitato.1: Hyperactivation with frantic movement and difficulty concentrating
eccitato.2: Compulsive search for stimuli and high-intensity activities
eccitato.3: Rapid breathing alternating with acute and frequent vocalizations
eccitato.4: Difficulty in impulse control with repetitive behaviors

calmo.1: Deep relaxation state with regular and slow breathing
calmo.2: Stretched and comfortable posture with completely relaxed muscles
calmo.3: Diffuse but not hypervigilant attention towards the environment
calmo.4: Stable emotional balance with appropriate responses to stimuli

giocoso.1: Behavioral activation aimed at play with repetitive sequences
giocoso.2: Dynamic social interaction with play invitation towards others
giocoso.3: Energy focused on playful activities with intensity variations
giocoso.4: Exploratory behavior with curiosity towards new objects and spaces

ansioso.1: Implement gradual desensitization techniques to triggers
ansioso.2: Create a safe zone with familiar comfort objects
ansioso.3: Introduce guided breathing exercises and muscle relaxation
ansioso.4: Evaluate the use of calming pheromones or natural supplements
ansioso.5: Maintain predictable routines to reduce uncertainty

triste.3: Increase positive social contact and cuddling
triste.4: Evaluate dietary changes to improve energy
triste.5: Monitor for possible underlying medical causes

aggressivo.2: Work on positive leadership and impulse control
aggressivo.3: Avoid identified triggers until training completion
aggressivo.5: Evaluate the environment to remove triggering factors

felice.1: Maintain current level of positive stimulation
felice.2: Continue activities that promote this emotional state
felice.3: Use this state to introduce new learning
felice.5: Maintain a balanced routine of activity and rest

eccitato.4: Work on basic commands to improve concentration
eccitato.5: Balance physical activities with calm moments

calmo.1: Maintain current environment that favors tranquility
calmo.2: Use this state for advanced training sessions
calmo.5: Maintain a stable and predictable environment

giocoso.1: Channel playful energy into structured activities
giocoso.2: Introduce games that stimulate the mind beyond the body
giocoso.3: Balance free play with guided play
giocoso.4: Use play as a learning tool
giocoso.5: Schedule regular and varied play sessions

ansioso.2: Separation from owner or attachment figures
ansioso.3: Presence of strangers or unknown animals in the environment
ansioso.4: Changes in daily routine or home environment

triste.1: Loss or prolonged absence of companions (human or animal)
triste.2: Reduction of usual social and recreational activities

aggressivo.3: Competition with other animals for limited resources
aggressivo.4: Physical pain or undiagnosed medical discomfort

felice.1: Presence of owner or loved ones
felice.4: Familiar and safe environments with stable routines

eccitato.4: Presence of other energetic animals or people

calmo.3: Absence of stressful or disturbing stimuli

giocoso.1: Presence of interactive or stimulating toys
giocoso.2: Interaction with other young or playful animals
giocoso.4: Specific times of day associated with play

training.title: AI Training Protocols

training.protocolCreatedDescription: The training protocol has been created successfully
training.protocolDeletedDescription: The protocol has been deleted successfully
training.title: AI Training Protocols
training.subtitle: Access advanced AI-powered protocols to optimize your pet's behavior and wellbeing

descriptions.Stabilire un ambiente sicuro e confortev: Establish a safe and comfortable environment where the animal can relax and build confidence. This exercise creates the foundation for all other social training.
descriptions.Costruire fiducia tra animale e handler: Build trust between animal and handler through positive interactions and constant reinforcement.
descriptions.Permettere all'animale di osservare l'am: Allow the animal to observe the surrounding environment without direct interaction pressure.

instructions.Scegli uno spazio tranquillo e familiare: Choose a quiet and familiar space for the animal
instructions.Posiziona il tappetino comfort in un ang: Place the comfort mat in a safe corner
instructions.Offri snack premio quando l'animale si a: Offer reward treats when the animal approaches spontaneously
instructions.Mantieni distanza e lascia che l'animale: Keep distance and let the animal explore freely
instructions.Rinforza positivamente ogni comportament: Positively reinforce every calm and relaxed behavior
instructions.BODY LANGUAGE: Osserva postura rilassata: BODY LANGUAGE: Observe relaxed posture, tail in neutral position
instructions.BODY LANGUAGE: Cerca respiro regolare e: BODY LANGUAGE: Look for regular breathing and relaxed ears
instructions.BODY LANGUAGE: Evita segnali stress come: BODY LANGUAGE: Avoid stress signals like panting or trembling
instructions.Inizia con sessioni brevi di presenza de: Start with short sessions of handler presence
instructions.Usa rinforzi positivi per ogni piccolo p: Use positive reinforcement for every small progress
instructions.Monitora sempre i segnali di stress dell: Always monitor the animal's stress signals
instructions.Posiziona l'animale in punto di osservaz: Position the animal at an elevated observation point
instructions.Permetti osservazione passiva senza forz: Allow passive observation without forcing interactions
instructions.Modifica ambiente alimentare per ridurre: Modify feeding environment to reduce competition
instructions.Identifica oggetti o situazioni che scat: Identify objects or situations that trigger fear

targetBehaviors.Migliorare competenze sociali, ridurre t: Improve social skills, reduce shyness, increase confidence in interactions

dashboard.interruptProtocolDescription: Are you sure you want to interrupt this training protocol? Progress will be saved but you'll need to start over from the beginning.
Are you sure you want to interrupt this protocol? All progress will be lost.
dashboard.tipText: Always maintain a positive and patient attitude. If your pet doesn't respond immediately, repeat the exercise more slowly and reward them for every small progress.
dashboard.congratulationsMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the entire protocol "{{protocolTitle}}" and your rating has been saved!
dashboard.ratingDialogDescription: Congratulations! You have completed the entire protocol "{{protocolTitle}}". Your rating will help us improve our protocols.
dashboard.commentsPlaceholder: Share your experience: what worked best? What could you improve?

socializzazioneProgressiva.title: Progressive Socialization
socializzazioneProgressiva.description: 5-day protocol to improve the animal's social skills with other animals and people. Gradual and positive approach for shy or poorly socialized animals, with focus on confidence building and controlled interactions.

controlloAggressivitaReattiva.title: Reactive Aggression Control
controlloAggressivitaReattiva.description: Advanced protocol for safe management of reactive aggression. Absolute priority on safety, impulse control and development of alternative behaviors. Requires professional supervision.

gestioneAnsiaSeparazione.title: Separation Anxiety Management
gestioneAnsiaSeparazione.description: Scientific protocol to reduce separation anxiety through gradual desensitization. Develops independence and tranquility during owner absences with ultra-gradual approach.

rieducazioneAlimentareComportamentale.title: Behavioral Food Re-education
rieducazioneAlimentareComportamentale.description: Intermediate protocol to resolve behavioral disorders related to feeding. Addresses compulsive eating, food refusal, food guarding and food anxiety through a gradual and non-punitive approach.

ottimizzazioneCicloSonnoVeglia.title: Sleep-Wake Cycle Optimization
ottimizzazioneCicloSonnoVeglia.description: Specialized protocol to establish healthy sleep patterns, reduce insomnia and night awakenings. Through pre-sleep routines, environmental optimization and circadian regulation, helps animals develop natural and restorative rest habits.

superareFobiePaureSpecifiche.title: Overcoming Specific Phobias and Fears
superareFobiePaureSpecifiche.description: Advanced systematic desensitization program to overcome intense phobias of noises, objects and specific situations through gradual scientific techniques

stopComportamentiDistruttivi.title: Stop Destructive Behaviors
stopComportamentiDistruttivi.description: Intensive protocol to eliminate destructive chewing, excessive digging and destruction of household objects.

gestioneGelosiaEPossessivita.title: Jealousy and Possessiveness Management
gestioneGelosiaEPossessivita.description: Specialized protocol to reduce possessive behaviors and jealousy in pets. Includes advanced desensitization techniques, sharing training and resource management.

riattivazioneEnergiaMotivazione.title: Energy and Motivation Reactivation
riattivazioneEnergiaMotivazione.description: Gradual protocol to combat depression, apathy and loss of interest in animals. Gentle and progressive approach to awaken motivation through sensory stimuli, physical activation and restoration of social interest.

gestioneIperattivatEDeficitAttenzione.title: Hyperactivity and Attention Deficit Management
gestioneIperattivatEDeficitAttenzione.description: Complete protocol to reduce hyperactivity and improve concentration through a progressive approach: from constructive energy discharge to impulse control, up to relaxation and self-control.

descriptions.Protocollo di 5 giorni per migliorare le: 5-day protocol to improve the animal's social skills with other animals and people. Gradual and positive approach for shy or under-socialized animals, with focus on confidence building and controlled interactions.
descriptions.Protocollo avanzato per la gestione sicu: Advanced protocol for safe management of reactive aggression. Absolute priority on safety, impulse control and developing alternative behaviors. Requires professional supervision.
descriptions.Protocollo scientifico per ridurre l'ans: Scientific protocol to reduce separation anxiety through gradual desensitization. Develops independence and tranquility during owner absence with ultra-gradual approach.
descriptions.Protocollo intermedio per risolvere dist: Intermediate protocol to resolve food-related behavioral disorders. Addresses compulsive eating, food refusal, food guarding and food anxiety through a gradual and non-punitive approach.
descriptions.Protocollo specializzato per stabilire p: Specialized protocol to establish healthy sleep patterns, reduce insomnia and nighttime awakenings. Through pre-sleep routines, environmental optimization and circadian regulation, helps animals develop natural and restorative rest habits.
descriptions.Programma avanzato di desensibilizzazion: Advanced systematic desensitization program to overcome intense phobias of noises, objects and specific situations through gradual scientific techniques
descriptions.Protocollo intensivo per eliminare masti: Intensive protocol to eliminate destructive chewing, excessive digging and destruction of household objects.
descriptions.Protocollo specializzato per ridurre com: Specialized protocol to reduce possessive behaviors and jealousy in pets. Includes advanced desensitization techniques, sharing training and resource management.
descriptions.Protocollo graduale per combattere depre: Gradual protocol to combat depression, apathy and loss of interest in animals. Gentle and progressive approach to awaken motivation through sensory stimuli, physical activation and restoration of social interest.
descriptions.Protocollo completo per ridurre iperatti: Complete protocol to reduce hyperactivity and improve concentration through a progressive approach: from constructive energy discharge to impulse control, to relaxation and self-control.

emptyState.title: No protocols found
emptyState.description: Start by creating your first personalized training protocol.
